channel.title: Harold Albrecht
channel.description: Recent news about Harold Albrecht, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Oye! Times
item.description:
Fundraiser Hosts, Tory MPs, Unaware Wallin Billed Taxpayers
The events hosted by MP Harold Albrecht and MP Kellie Leitch were highlighted by auditors in a report released this week. The audit concluded that Ms. Wallin shall return wrongly claimed $121,000 in improper expenses, some of it for partisan work.

item.title: Mentioned by ObserverXtra
item.description:
Breslau firm gets $2.3 million
Employees at Conestoga Meat Packers celebrate the recent investment by the federal government in the company, alongside Harold Albrecht, MP for Kitchener-Conestoga, Bob Hunsberger, chairman of company's board of directors and CEO Arnold Drung.

item.title: Mentioned by Canada.com
item.description:
Silence rules as maverick Tory seeks to lift muzzle
Maverick MP Mark Warawa appealed to his colleagues Wednesday to allow his motion condemning sex-selective abortions. They had rejected the motion as unvotable last week, arguing it was too similar to another motion ... In the same stuffy committee room in the bowels of Parliament's Centre Block, a number of Warawa's supporters in caucus showed up, including Rob Anders of Alberta and Harold Albrecht of Ontario. The committee promptly went in camera after Warawa's statement. Whether the committee will ...
